abort.already_setup: You can only configure a single Easee connection.

error.auth_failure: Unable to connect to Easee. Check your username and password.
error.connection_failure: Unable to connect to Easee. Test again later.
error.refused_failure: Connection refused to Easee. Test again later.

user.description: Please enter the username and password for your Easee account
user.title: Connect to Easee

deprecated_service.description:
The use of the service **{deprecation}** is deprecated and the service will be removed in the future.

Please convert your automations and scripts to use **{recommend}** as soon as possible
deprecated_service.title: Use of deprecated service: {deprecation}
